title: Why am I getting low priority queues ?
body:
They had a problem on their servers, I got kicked AFK about three times (trying to play Aram) and now I've been getting 10min queues because of that?

How unfair.

replies.body: There haven't been any server issues this morning, but I'd like to help with any troubleshooting.  When you say you are getting kicked for AFK, where and when exactly is that happening?  Are you getting any error messages?
